project.description: Need to have patients sequenced before running this job

hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
#!/bin/bash
### assume etl role aws sts assume-role --duration-seconds 900 --role-arn arn:aws:iam::736265540791:role/dbgap-etl --role-session-name "s3-test" > assume-role-output.txt
export AWS_ACCESS_KEY_ID=`grep AccessKeyId assume-role-output.txt | cut -d ':' -f 2 | sed "s/[ ,\"]//g"` export AWS_SECRET_ACCESS_KEY=`grep SecretAccessKey assume-role-output.txt | cut -d ':' -f 2 | sed "s/[ ,\"]//g"` export AWS_SESSION_TOKEN=`grep SessionToken assume-role-output.txt | cut -d ':' -f 2 | sed "s/[ ,\"]//g"`
mkdir data mkdir completed mkdir hierarchies mkdir processing
find data/ -type f -exec rm -rf {} \; find processing/ -type f -exec rm -rf {} \; find completed/ -type f -exec rm -rf {} \; rm -rf pic-sure-hpds/
aws s3 cp ${managed_inputs} .
unset AWS_ACCESS_KEY_ID unset AWS_SECRET_ACCESS_KEY unset AWS_SESSION_TOKEN
awk -F, '{print $1","$2","$3","$8","$9}' Managed_Inputs.csv > inputs.csv
cat inputs.csv IFS=',' [ ! -f inputs.csv ] while read abv_name stdy_id stdy_type data_ready data_processed do if [[ "${data_ready,,}" == "yes" ]]; then
if [ ${stdy_type,,} == "biolincc" ] || [ ${stdy_type,,} == "other" ] || [ ${stdy_type,,} == "orchid" ]; then
aws sts assume-role --duration-seconds 900 --role-arn arn:aws:iam::736265540791:role/dbgap-etl --role-session-name "s3-test" > assume-role-output.txt
export AWS_ACCESS_KEY_ID=`grep AccessKeyId assume-role-output.txt | cut -d ':' -f 2 | sed "s/[ ,\"]//g"` export AWS_SECRET_ACCESS_KEY=`grep SecretAccessKey assume-role-output.txt | cut -d ':' -f 2 | sed "s/[ ,\"]//g"` export AWS_SESSION_TOKEN=`grep SessionToken assume-role-output.txt | cut -d ':' -f 2 | sed "s/[ ,\"]//g"`
aws s3 cp s3://avillach-73-bdcatalyst-etl/${abv_name^^}/completed/${abv_name^^}_GlobalVars.csv data/
unset AWS_ACCESS_KEY_ID unset AWS_SECRET_ACCESS_KEY unset AWS_SESSION_TOKEN fi fi done < inputs.csv
aws sts assume-role --duration-seconds 900 --role-arn arn:aws:iam::736265540791:role/dbgap-etl --role-session-name "s3-test" > assume-role-output.txt
export AWS_ACCESS_KEY_ID=`grep AccessKeyId assume-role-output.txt | cut -d ':' -f 2 | sed "s/[ ,\"]//g"` export AWS_SECRET_ACCESS_KEY=`grep SecretAccessKey assume-role-output.txt | cut -d ':' -f 2 | sed "s/[ ,\"]//g"` export AWS_SESSION_TOKEN=`grep SessionToken assume-role-output.txt | cut -d ':' -f 2 | sed "s/[ ,\"]//g"`
aws s3 cp s3://avillach-73-bdcatalyst-etl/general/completed/GLOBAL_allConcepts.csv data/
java -jar jars/MergeGlobalAllConcepts.jar
aws s3 cp completed/GLOBAL_allConcepts.csv s3://avillach-73-bdcatalyst-etl/general/completed/GLOBAL_allConcepts_merged.csv
unset AWS_ACCESS_KEY_ID unset AWS_SECRET_ACCESS_KEY unset AWS_SESSION_TOKEN
